Exact IT Consulting understands the role technology plays in the success of any company, but meeting the technology needs on a budget often seems out of reach for any size of business. Exact IT Consulting focuses on 3 primary segments within technology. Professional Services-Server & Network Management-Hardware Solutions and Support. -IT Operations Assessment-Disaster Recovery, Backup, and Business Continuity Managed Services-Server Support-Help Desk Support-Monitoring Services-Backup ServicesDevelopment Services-Application Life Cycle Management, Selection-Web Portals -Systems Integration-Implementation and Migration Consulting

As a Systems Admin I was responsible as the primary lead between our enterprise applications and the business, in order to transform the business needs to a functional process. I performed requirements gathering, analysis and design for the business units and translated that into the proper applications. This role required the use of proper change control processes and documentation methods, both of which I helped improve during this my time in this role.During this time I was also responsible for the maintenance of several infrastructure applications such as Active Directory, Exchange Server 2010, Lync 2010, Dell EMS (Email Archiving) and SharePoint 2010.Lastly, I served as an IT liaison for building and infrastructure. I was the point of contact for building expansions, new department units and strategic growth.
